co.cask.tigon.sql.util
Class MetaInformationParser

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.tigon.sql.util.MetaInformationParser

public class MetaInformationParser
extends Object

This is a utility class to get meta information from files generated by the SQL Compiler Sample qtree.xml - Contains meta information about LFTA & HFTA. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . output_spec.cfg - Contains a list of all the query names whose results will be shared with the end-user

          This method returns the number of HFTA processes to be instantiated by parsing the qtree.xml file

getSchemaMap

public static Map<String,StreamSchema> getSchemaMap(File fileLocation)
                                             throws IOException
This function generates the StreamSchema for each query specified by the user

Parameters:
fileLocation - Directory that contains the qtree.xml file & the output_spec.cfg
Returns:
A map of query names and the associated StreamSchema
